item.title: The probability of "ETH hitting an all-time high this year" on Polymarket has risen to 74%.
item.description: On August 10th, based on official information, the probability on Polymarket that "Ethereum will hit an all-time high this year" has increased to 74%.

item.title: Michael Saylor: Bitcoin Will Outperform the S&P 500 Index in the "Foreseeable Future"
item.description: On August 10th, as reported by Cointelegraph, Michael Saylor, the CEO of MicroStrategy, stated, "I believe that the entire cryptoeconomy is undergoing an innovation boom. From a marginal effect perspective, this is beneficial to everyone in the digital asset space. I still maintain that the vast majority of the funds flowing into this space are flowing into Bitcoin."Saylor also pointed out that in the past six months, the number of companies holding Bitcoin has increased from approximately 60 to 160. "Therefore, I am still highly focused on Bitcoin."Saylor predicted that Bitcoin will outperform the S&P 500 index in the "foreseeable future." He further added, "I think Bitcoin is digital capital."

item.title: Arthur Hayes 「Buy Low, Sell High」 on Ethereum and ETH Forkcoins
item.description: August 10th. According to the monitoring of @EmberCN, Arthur Hayes, the co-founder of BitMEX, stated in a post yesterday that after announcing his intention to repurchase ETH, he transferred 14.8 million USDC to the exchange platform and multiple institutional business platforms. In the past 2 hours, he has received $6.85 million in assets: 1,250 ETH ($5.29 million), 424,000 LDO ($550,000), 420,000 ETHFI ($510,000), and 92,000 PENDLE ($500,000).Earlier on August 2nd, Arthur Hayes predicted that BTC would retrace to $100,000 and ETH to $3,000. Therefore, he sold the ETH and ETH ecosystem tokens he bought in July, including ENA, AAVE, LDO, ETHFI, and PEPE. The ETH sell-off price was $3,506.

item.title: Binance Alpha's new airdrop WAI will be launched on August 12th
item.description: August 10th. Binance Alpha is set to launch World3 (WAI) on August 12th. Once trading commences, eligible users can access the Alpha event page to claim the airdrop by using Binance Alpha Points. Further details will be made public shortly.

item.title: Meme Coin SPARK's Market Cap Surges Above $33 Million, with a 95% Spike in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 10th, based on GMGN data, on the Solana blockchain, the AI virtual creature concept Meme token SPARK had its market capitalization briefly exceed $33 million, reaching a new all-time high. It witnessed a 95% increase in the past 24 hours and a 24-hour trading volume of $26.2 million.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: BNB Short-Term Drops Below $800
item.description: On August 10th, according to HTX market data, BNB briefly fell below $800, experiencing a 24-hour decrease of 0.85%.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Drops Below $4200
item.description: On August 10th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum dropped below $4200, and the 24-hour increase narrowed to 0.35%.

item.title: Binance Alpha Launches GameBuild (GAME)
item.description: On August 10th, Binance Alpha launched GameBuild (GAME).

item.title: If Bitcoin surpasses $120,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $1.154 billion.
item.description: On August 10th, according to Coinglass data, in the event that Bitcoin surges above $120,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.154 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the cumulative long liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will be $950 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not disclose the precise number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of the contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually signify the relative significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, the intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart illustrates to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be impacted when it attains a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that the price will undergo a more intense reaction due to a surge in liquidity once it reaches that level.

item.title: Arthur Hayes acquires 41,628 HYPE tokens, worth $1.8 million
item.description: On August 10th, based on on-chain data, the address belonging to Arthur Hayes withdrew 41,628 HYPE tokens from Gate Exchange 40 minutes ago, with a value of $1.8 million.
